title: Language proficiency certificates (TOEFL, IELTS)
dataVerified: Test taker name, test date, test center, overall score, section scores (reading, writing, listening, speaking), test type
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: University admissions verification for international students. Standardized certificate format from testing organizations (ETS, IDP, British Council). Privacy-preserving verification without exposing full test details. Domain binding to official testing organizations prevents fake certificates. Critical for immigration and university admissions where language proficiency must be proven.
